title: citizens插件无法运行任何指令
author: Dirito
txt_content:
输入/npc或者/citizens
都会红字提示：
an internal error occured while attempting to perform this command

1.13paperspigot服务端

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 尝试更换 spigot ，可能是兼容问题

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
需要下载合适是版本才行
citizens-v1_13_R2-2.0.25-SNAPSHOT.jar
